Summary: Intense bright light in eastern sky.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was leaving work about 3:45 a.m. on the morning in question and noticed a very bright light in low in the sky to the east. At first I though it was a police helicopter hovering over downtown because of the intensity of the light, but as I began to drive that direction home I could tell that the light was further to the east than I thought. When I got home I went out to my balcony and took these photographs and video. The light didn't move from its position for over 2 hours until just as the sun was coming up. It then slowly moved up and to the south which negates the possibility of the light being a celestial body of some sort. There is a military base to the east of Denver, but DIA (the airport) is out in that direction as well so the light couldn't have gone unnoticed.
trends: There have been 185 other sightings in Denver
There was one other sighting in Denver on or around June 22nd 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
